           com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 gravity,
           boolean doSleeping)
        Instantiates the EntityWorld's EntityManager, SystemManager, and template map.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera that will be used for rendering this world.
        gravity - The gravity vector2.
        doSleeping - Whether the world allows sleeping.
